description: '''XavlegbmaofffassssitimiwoamndutroabcwapwaeiippohfffX''', often abbreviated as '''Xavleg''', is a South African [[death metal]] band known for their brutal style and comedic themes involving [[Internet meme]]s and [[graphic violence]].
